Posts.Content: Hi Bestbird I just found out a week ago through Foundation One testing that I have the Pki32ca I am Triple positive dx in 2013 with ILC mets to peritoneal in 2015. Managing stage 4 on the het2climb study now. Have you heard of a her2 positive with that mutation? Also, will ask my oncologist if that med would work for me. It's mind boggling! Thank you Angie
Posts.Title: New Approved Drug for HR+, HER2- MBC with PIK3 Mutation!
